case.title: LOOKING FOR GIRLFRIEND - 28 (STATEN ISLAND)
case.text:
I AM 5'7 rangy, unforgettable,optimistic,sociable.
I am looking for family-oriented girlfriend. Age at list 22 with whom i can go to museums and restaurants and have fun. My girlfriend should exchange all my friends.
I am looking only in New York City face to face and no online chatting. Only if they leads to dating.
PICTURE A MOST
PHONE: NINE ONE SEVEN THREE THREE ZERO TWO FOUR ZERO ONE. WILLIAM
